subject: Change in Composition of Members of Conciliation committee of Independent Experts - 1 (CCEI-1)- reg.
text: HRaty <7yzly  <THRf xifearut TH19 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (v Wde7 &k)_{rTHTf HAT4) 44H Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3f-5 & 6, #azr-10 , #RWT, 7 ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Conciliation Committee/2020 Policy Circular No. 2.1.33/2020 Dated 31st January, 2020 [Decision taken on File no: NHAI/CMD/Conciliation/2019 in pursuance of Chairman'$ instruction vide note dated 21.01.2020] Subject: Change in Composition of Members of Conciliation Committee of Independent Experts -1 (CCIE-1) NHAI vide   Policy Circular no_ 2.1.22/2017 dated 02.06.2017 established a Conciliation and Settlement Mechanism for contractual disputes under the contract agreements with the Contractors/ Concessionaires/ Consultants of NHAI. At present, three nos. of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts have been constituted: 2 Sh. Jagdish Khattar, Ex. Member of CCIE-1_ vide his letter dated 06.01.2020 submitted his resignation as a member of CCIE-1. Sh. Y. S. Malik, IAS (Retd.) and Ex- Secretary, MoRTH has been nominated as Member of CCIE-1 on 21.01.2020 in place of Sh. Jagdish Khattar. Accordingly, now the composition of CCIE-1 is as follows: Composition of CCIE-1 S.No. Name of the Members Sh. Pradeep Kumar ii) Sh. Y. S. Malik iii) Sh.A. V . Sinha 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 31/ 2/ (V.K. Sharma) CGM (Coord &Parl:) (iv) All Officers of HQROs/PIUs / CMUs/Site Offices: (v) Hindi Officer for Translation in Hindi. (vi) Library for hosting the circular in library site. (AT M RT 4I NHAI Reg.
